message.content:
Great, here's a vegetarian diet plan for tomorrow:

<start>

Meal #1
Meal name: Scrambled Tofu and Avocado Toast
Preparation: 
- Mash half an avocado on a slice of whole wheat toast.
- Crumble 100g of firm tofu with your hands and saut√© in a pan with 1 tsp of olive oil, salt, and pepper until cooked through. 
Protein: 15g 
Fat: 17g 
Carbs: 33g 
Estimated preparation time: 15 minutes 

Meal #2
Meal name: Chickpea Salad Wrap
Preparation:
- Drain and rinse a can of chickpeas and place them in a bowl. Add chopped veggies of choice (like cucumber, bell pepper, or carrot), 1 tsp of olive oil, and salt and pepper to taste.
- Toss the mixture to combine and transfer it onto a whole wheat wrap.
Protein: 15g 
Fat: 9g 
Carbs: 40g 
Estimated preparation time: 20 minutes 

Meal #3
Meal name: Lentil and Mixed Vegetable Stir Fry
Preparation:
- Cook 100g of lentils according to package instructions.
- Heat some oil in a pan and add chopped veggies of your choice (like broccoli, carrots, mushrooms, or bell peppers) and stir-fry until crisp but tender.
- Add cooked lentils, soy sauce, and spices like ginger or garlic. Stir-fry for an additional 1-2 minutes. 
Protein: 18g 
Fat: 7g 
Carbs: 62g 
Estimated preparation time: 30 minutes 

<stop> 

This meal plan provides approximately 1500 calories and meets your goals of weight loss and muscle gain, while also being vegetarian-friendly and fulfilling your time constraints. Remember to drink plenty of water throughout the day and tailor each meal to your individual preferences and dietary needs.

chatHistory.content: Act as a helpful and motivating nutritionist. Help me to create a diet plan based on my profile data. Please be concise and use simple language, if the user provides a structured way of displaying information please respect use only that structure and no more words. Your first reply is "Hi", one word.
